A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was alot of fun\, however there were few nitpicking plot points(that I won't go into for spoilers) that stood out as completely deflated from the previous movie... or just not that important. Other than that\, this may contain one of the cooler lightsaber fights we have ever seen\, and one truly jaw dropping moment of destruction. Go see it\, it was awesome.
